item.title: Reading List
item.description: 2020 Joseph Y. Halpern - Actual Causality The Philosophy of Computer Science

item.title: About Me
item.description: Martín Rodriguez is a musician, electrical engineer, and software developer currently living in Portland, OR. This is a picture of Martín as an egg. He received his Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from Portland State University in 2019. He is working on a Master of Engineering in Electrical Engineering with a focus on Signal Processing and Machine Learning, to be completed in Spring 2023. You can view his CV below.
